name: Blue P's Adventures
description:
This is the first game I made entirely alone. From graphic assets to music. It's a 2D platformer where you'll have to go through several levels and face different enemies and bosses. You can collect coins to buy items and increase your chances of winning.

I hope you like the game, do not hesitate to give your opinion in the comments.

Thank you !

Controls :

  • Movements : Arrows
  • Jump : Space Bar
  • Use Item : W, X, and C
  • Pause : Escape

Technologies Used :

  • Game Engine : Unity
  • Musics and Sound effects : GarageBand
  • Graphic Assets : Piskel
